facts: He was born in Cleveland, OH.
He competes semi-competitively in CrossFit competitions.
He shares a birthday with Chris Rock, Ashton Kutcher, and Charles Dickens.
He attended the Berklee College of Music in Boston, MA as a bass performance major.
His favorite movie is Good Will Hunting.
His favorite TV show is Seinfeld.
You could pay him $1,000 to go to Disneyland for a day... and he would still decline.
His wife is a professional musician and tours around the world. Check her music out at aubreylogan.com
During high school he played basketball against Lebron James... and got destroyed, obviously.
His favorite book is 'Boys In the Boat' by Daniel James Brown.

college.name: Berklee College of Music
other: Worked as a tour guide at the college for two years
